segments.text: I notice the water overflowing, and it’s making me really uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just ignoring it, which makes it even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s going to be a mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are making it worse by sneaking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it’s just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is messy and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand seeing things like this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should be paying more attention to what’s going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just fix it already.
segments.speaker: PAR
